name: Artemis Lutea-Demo
description:
How to play:

Use Left n Right Arrow Key to progress dialogue. The rests were done by mouse clicks.

IMPORTANT:

This is only a demo that demonstrates the current function. The plot is still all over the place.

Resolution: Please set resolution to 1024x768 manually. This demo is have some weird issue with resolution.

Walkthrough: Consider this demo didn't incorporate a well flushed-out plot. I will give you cheats:

When Gabriel says that the knife is Eduardo's, present autopsy report.

Thanx xD
